room_title: Escape room "Intergalactic Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: Mentally stimulating and challenging. Requires good cognitive skills and patience. I loved experiencing this with my loved ones. Planning to return to take on the Island Escape. The tour guide was as fun as the adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Intergalactic Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: The Intergalactic one was so well designed and absorbing and had some hilarious moments!

room_title: Escape room "Intergalactic Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: I did the Intergalactic room with a corporate team and it was fantastic! Great team building and leadership exercise in a wonderful venue! Will definitely be back for the Island room!
